pages.text: Hello, $(playername), I was waiting for you. $(br2)Today, your simple human life will change. I'll teach you how to become much more. I'll teach you how to become a... $(turtlemancer).
$(turtlemancy)Turtles$() are powerful magical creatures, but they don't know about it. They don't even care!

But we know about it now, and we can achieve enormous things using that power. $(br2)Not anyone can be a $(turtlemancer) anyway, to be one you need to gain their favor. You know what they say: $(br2)$(br)$(o)The Turtle chooses the Turtlemancer.$()
To let a $(turtle) choose you, bow and look into it's eyes when it is looking at you.
